Description: Lip sherd of East Greek (South Ionian) pottery cup; orange clay with much silver mica; interior: glazed light brown with reserved band at top of lip; outside reserved with glazed band at lower break; inscription cut on exterior, in reserved zone.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 309)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 669, no. 270)
Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p.256, no.1)
Johnston 2006b / The Delta: From Gamma to Zeta (p.24,25 fig.5a)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.855)
